HIPPLUG-883
When visiting the sitemap java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError is logged and you get a Server Error
Upgrade to Hippo 7.9. This version is no longer compatible with previous Hippo releases. Use 1.04.xx range for pre-7.9 Hippo versions.

HIPPLUG-673
In the manifest of the content module, added Implementation-Build entry with a fixed value that reflects the release version.

HIPPLUG-648
Improvement: dependencies and import updated to Hippo CMS 7.8.2 equivalents. Has lead to compatibility with CMS 7.8 and up only.
The sitemap.xml is now properly served as a .tar.gz through the REST pipeline

All sitemap generators are now dependant on HstRequestContext instead of HstRequest to allow them to work in a REST pipeline too. Also added the ability to specify a Mount so that a REST pipeline can serve a sitemap from another mount thant he site that is being sitemapped.
Added a JAX-RS resource to be used in a Hippo REST-interface. It outputs a site map in different formats, including a tar.gz archive.

HIPPLUG-571
Cleanup and refresh LICENSE and NOTICE files.
Stable version on CMS 7.6 (HST 2.22.xx) and up. Please see the svn history for details.
